document_data.name: Rhiiman Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhiiman Obarskyr''' was the brother of the first king of [[Cormyr]], [[Faerlthann Obarskyr]].
document_data.Relatives: Rhiiman's father was [[Ondeth Obarskyr]] and his mother was [[Suzara Obarskyr]]. His older brother was the first king of Cormyr, Faerlthann Obarskyr.
document_data.Background: Rhiiman came to the land that would become known as [[Suzail]] with his parents and his older brother in [[6 DR]].
